Personally, I think that URF mode last season was better because of how the map was laid out eg. jungle camps and reshaped terrain and also because of the map texture. It just seemed to feel hyped unlike this season's map. Another factor is the nerfs for most of the champs. But overall, it was still great. Good Job Rito. C:
